Contact us:

Route timetable

Route 8 Town/village Location Time
MIP/8A Chelmondiston School 0925 – 1045
MIP/8B Chelmondiston The Red Lion 1050 – 1120
MIP/8C Woolverstone Marina 1130 – 1155
MIP/8D Stutton Larksfield 1210 – 1240
MIP/8E Stutton Community shop 1245 – 1315
MIP/8F Holbrook Royal Hospital School 1420 – 1435
MIP/8G Holbrook The Street 1445 – 1630
